title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.13 - Bottom blowoff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.13 - Bottom blowoff

State Regulations

Each boiler shall have a blowoff pipe connection fitted
with a valve or cock not less than 3/4 inch pipe size connected with the lowest
water space practicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-5.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
